_comment.plex_base_url: Base URL of your Plex server (e.g., http://localhost:32400).
_comment.plex_library_ids: List of Plex library IDs to sync (e.g., [10,21,35]).
_comment.silent: True = only summary logs, False = detailed logs
_comment.always_apply_nfo: True = always apply NFO metadata regardless of hash
_comment.threads: Number of worker threads for initial scanning
_comment.delete_nfo_after_apply: true = remove NFO file after applying
